name: SolarMente
long_description:
We integrate solar, storage and energy trading for each home in one smart solution via our software platform. Weâ€™re starting in Spain which has the highest potential for solar and one of the lowest market penetration in Europe (0.1%). 
 
We will help 5M Spanish homeowners produce, store and distribute their clean energy ($50B market). We are backed by GFC, Liquid2 Ventures, Soma Capital, Y Combinator and other investors including Atomico angels.
